comment: Ppl on Gab love to pull this type of vapid "logic." They'll show poaching in Africa and go "what savages! We don't need this!" But if some white hunter goes to Africa and kills the exact same lion, they're like "git er dun! Yee haw!" and high five. So you can tell they actually don't care about the lion, it's a tool they use for their stupid belief systems.
